Title: Tales of Gekijou
Description:
['Tales of Gekijou is the pre-order bonus for Tales of the Heroes: Twin Brave. It is a series of five short animations produced by Sunrise. ', '
', '
', '
', "
Episodes 1 and 2 were aired in BS-TBS's New Year Special. The other 3 episodes will be available in the pre-order bonus via a download code along with the first two."]
Characters: ['Lowell, Yuri', 'Fon Fabre, Luke', 'Wilder, Zelos', 'Cecil, Guy', 'Magnus, Lion', 'Lhant, Asbel', 'Hershel, Reid', 'Barnes, Cheria']
Voices: ['Toriumi, Kousuke', 'Suzuki, Chihiro', 'Onosaka, Masaya', 'Matsumoto, Yasunori', 'Midorikawa, Hikaru', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Kawaragi, Shiho']
Staff: [['Satou, Hiroyuki', 'Producer'], ['Konno, Yasuyuki', 'Sound Effects'], ['Yoshitake, Masato', 'Editing'], ['Oogami, Youichi', 'Director of Photography']]
